TABLE.NAME: contentscheduler
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the contentscheduler activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

TABLE.NAME: timing
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: repeatcount
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of weeks over which to add new activiti/ies

FIELD.NAME: sessioncount
FIELD.COMMENT: How many activities in total to deliver (CONFIRM)

FIELD.NAME: timefinish
FIELD.COMMENT: datetime when last set of activities will be available

FIELD.NAME: activitiespersession
FIELD.COMMENT: Activities per repeated session, e.g. 5 quizzes per week
